title: (x) Victoria - Alexon RR, FF Scala Sans {Yves}
content:
Hello folks,   
First post. I have to say I have only just found this site and am gobstrucked by how knowledgable you lot are. See if anyone pick this font used as a government dept logo...   
 [http://www.jobs.vic.gov.au/CA256D160006CABE/WebObj/banner\_jobs/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000352/http:/www.jobs.vic.gov.au/CA256D160006CABE/WebObj/banner_jobs/)$File/banner\_jobs.gif   
Regards   
PAUL   
SkyRocket Design Co
author: skyrocket

comments.content:
Yves - thank you for your time & effort. Yes, that's the best sample I have so I will have a good look at Alexon. This site is a great resource and I will no doubt have plenty more font ID's to post. BTW your pic looks a bit like Bon Scott to me! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000352im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
Regards   
PAUL   
SkyRocket Design Co
I don't know who Bon Scott is but it sure sounds like a sexy name to me ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000352im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
This photo of Bon Scott doesn't look like Yves to me...Boy, can names be deceiving ![bon](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000352im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15971.gif)
ok, maybe that was a bad pic. I guess here I can see some similarities... ![twins](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000352im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/15976.jpg)
Thanks people - you sure know your fonts in here! I'm going to post another one to test you - one that's been puzzling me for months...
